name: Edge of Grief
description:
Edge of Grief is a 2D action platforming game about restoring a dark world to its former glory. It combines discovering deep emotions and an action platform experience as you become the ‘hero’ unveiling the truth inside as you take another step closer to atonement.

Hack and slash or utilize your magic to kill enemies and progress through the world. If fighting is not your style utilize movement and dashing mechanics to weasel your way around opponents. Integrated within the game is a speedrun system that keeps track of your current time on a level.

Tyrannical Studios developed this project as a passion project over the course of a university semester. We hope that you will be able to play through our game and give us relevant feedback. Thanks for your time.
